title: 【跑酷】CACTUS JUMP|仙人掌跑酷|1.11.2|CIV_C
author: Xiao_Tao_Zi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 像素君 于 2017-8-9 21:29 编辑 



简介 InfoRun this Map on 1.11.2 For the Best Results!This map is a parkour/puzzle hybrid. Navigating through a field of cacti, your goal is to reach the end of each level with new roadblocks thrown at you with each level.Features like perks, multiple exits, and ramps cover the arenas to help or hinder your adventure!15 Levels to PlayA Challenge For Experienced Parkour PlayersSimple Map Design
If you discover any glitches or bugs within the map, feel free to report them to me in the comments!
在1.11.2运行次地图会得到最好的效果！这是一个混杂着跑酷与解密的地图。在仙人掌中穿梭，你的目标是达到每一关的终点。地图的特征有buff，多出口，有可以妨碍或帮助你解密的坡道。有15关是一个对于跑酷玩家的挑战性地图简单的地图装饰
如果你发现有漏洞的话，请给我评论！
图片 Pictures







下载 Downlaod原贴：http://www.minecraftmaps.com/parkour-maps/cactus-jump
国内网盘：https://pan.baidu.com/s/1mhTeu4C
